sentence.Network_en: Help develop restructuring plans to assist clients in resolving delinquency and avoiding repossession of lease equipment.
sentence.Network_cn: 帮助建立重组计划,帮助客户解决逾期问题,避免回购.

sentence.Network_en: Unless repossession forces a sale, homeowners prefer to sit tight when markets are weak.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非回收房强制销售, 不然房主在房市低迷时更愿保持观望状态.

entry.def: The repossession of someone's house is the act of repossessing it.

example.tran: 面临住房被收回的家庭

entry.def: You can refer to a house or car that has been repossessed as a repossession .

example.ex: Many of the cars you will see at auction are repossessions.
example.tran: 你将在拍卖会上见到的许多车辆都是被收回物品。

means.word_mean: 1. the action of regaining possession (especially the seizure of collateral securing a loan that is in default)
